sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-text-field
    v-model="newTaskTitle"
    @keyup.enter="addTask"
    class="field-add-task pa-3"
    outlined
    placeholder="Add Task"
    hide-details
    clearable
  >
    <template v-slot:append>
      <v-icon
        @click="addTask"
        :disabled="newTaskTitleInvalid"
      >
        mdi-plus
      </v-icon>
    </template>
  </v-text-field>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newTaskTitle: ''
    }
  },
  computed: {
    newTaskTitleInvalid() {
      return !this.newTaskTitle
    }
  },
  methods: {
    addTask() {
      if (!this.newTaskTitleInvalid) {
        this.$store.dispatch('addTask', this.newTaskTitle)
        this.newTaskTitle = ''
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">
  .field-add-task.v-input--is-focused
    .v-input__slot
      background: rgba(31,94,129, 0.5)
</style>
